articles.description: Toyota expects the facility to be capable of producing enough lithium-ion batteries for 200,000 vehicles when production begins in 2025.
articles.content:
Toyota Motor will build a new $1.29 billion battery plant for electrified vehicles in North Carolina, the company announced Monday afternoon.
